<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; llvm::sandboxir::GlobalVariable::getInitializer () const</>}>
getInitializer - Return the initializer for this global variable.

It is illegal to call this method if the global is external, because we cannot tell what the value is initialized to!

### hasDefinitiveInitializer() {#a3cf0190c170a420ab2cefaa249c56665}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::sandboxir::GlobalVariable::hasDefinitiveInitializer () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
hasDefinitiveInitializer - Whether the global variable has an initializer, and any other instances of the global (this can happen due to weak linkage) are guaranteed to have the same initializer.

Note that if you want to transform a global, you must use <a href="#af20d98097edbb1810a0a4da41521d8c7">hasUniqueInitializer()</a> instead, because of the &#42;&#95;odr linkage type.

Example:

<em>=</em> global SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is both definitive and unique.

<b>=</b> global weak SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is neither definitive nor unique.

<code>=</code> global weak&#95;odr SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is definitive, but not unique.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h/#l00908">908</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h">Constant.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isConstant() {#ad5b1218ba4afd76fcd303620c91d2377}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::sandboxir::GlobalVariable::isConstant () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
If the value is a global constant, its value is immutable throughout the runtime execution of the program.

Assigning a value into the constant leads to undefined behavior.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h/#l00934">934</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h">Constant.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setInitializer() {#a9addc56ed8318970567e31311085b0e6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::sandboxir::GlobalVariable::setInitializer (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/constant">Constant</a> &#42; InitVal)</>}>
setInitializer - Sets the initializer for this global variable, removing any existing initializer if InitVal==NULL.

The initializer must have the type <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-cpp/#a9df55d50aee24118cfdc34ecb32db484">getValueType()</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### classof() {#a52b87399ac743178d43c569154afeaa0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::sandboxir::GlobalVariable::classof (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">sandboxir::Value</a> &#42; From)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
For isa/dyn&#95;cast.
